numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows how likely young adults interact with their parents each week.
2. A young adult is either female or male.
3. The graph says that young adults text their parents.
4. The graph says that young adults call their parents.
5. The graph says that young adults talk to their parents in person.
6. About 50% of male young adults text their parents each week.
7. About 75% of female young adults text their parents each week.
8. About 26% of female young adults visit a parent in person each week.
9. About 18% of male young adults visit a parent in person each week.
10. Male young adults have lower percentages than female young adults in these interactions.
11. Female young adults have higher percentages than male young adults in these interactions.
12. This difference may relate to gender differences between males and females.
